meanings.definition: The activity or hobby of being a fan of something, such as a sports team or a TV show.
meanings.sent1: Her fanac for the basketball team was evident in the way she cheered at every game.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy fanac for their favorite TV series by discussing it with friends.
meanings.sent3: His fanac for collecting rare coins led him to search every antique shop in town.
meanings.sent4: The fanac of the crowd lifted the spirits of the players on the field.
meanings.sent5: She expressed her fanac for the band by attending every concert they had.

meanings.definition: The enthusiasm or support shown by fans for a particular person, team, or thing.
meanings.sent1: The fanac of the audience was overwhelming as they cheered for the singer.
meanings.sent2: The fanac of the fans motivated the team to perform their best in the championship.
meanings.sent3: The fanac for the new movie release caused a long line at the ticket counter.
meanings.sent4: The fanac for the charity event resulted in a record-breaking amount of donations.
meanings.sent5: His fanac for the author's work was evident in the number of books he owned.
